texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Objective
texts.text: Objective

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Your objectives are to investigate the current working staff, particularly the two individuals of interest (Rebeka and Viktoria), as specified by the client. The client reports a sudden loss of revenue and discrepancies at this specific location that require further investigation.
texts.text: Your objectives are to investigate the current working staff, particularly the two individuals of interest (Rebeka and Viktoria), as specified by the client. The client reports a sudden loss of revenue and discrepancies at this specific location that require further investigation.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: FIRST WEEK:
texts.text: FIRST WEEK:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Today I started the investigation. I reviewed the objectives and responsibilities and focused on following these instructions accurately. It’s important to watch their behavior, the way they deal with money, their transactions, and their behaviors.
texts.text: Today I started the investigation. I reviewed the objectives and responsibilities and focused on following these instructions accurately. It’s important to watch their behavior, the way they deal with money, their transactions, and their behaviors.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: My goal for this week is to make sure I fit in as a regular employee and they don’t suspect anything. From what the client states, there are issues with financial discrepancy which may be due to employee theft. This week I focused on paying more attention to the store manager and her assistant since it was directed by the client.
texts.text: My goal for this week is to make sure I fit in as a regular employee and they don’t suspect anything. From what the client states, there are issues with financial discrepancy which may be due to employee theft. This week I focused on paying more attention to the store manager and her assistant since it was directed by the client.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Responsibilities
texts.text: Responsibilities

texts.label: text
texts.orig:
Blend into the environment 
Take detailed notes of daily interactions, suspicious behaviors, and employee routines.
Observe all interactions related to cash and inventory.
Monitor store manager Rebeka's routine and her interactions with staff.
texts.text:
Blend into the environment 
Take detailed notes of daily interactions, suspicious behaviors, and employee routines.
Observe all interactions related to cash and inventory.
Monitor store manager Rebeka's routine and her interactions with staff.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Monitor store assistant manager Viktoria’s routine and behavior when around Rebeka.
texts.text: Monitor store assistant manager Viktoria’s routine and behavior when around Rebeka.

texts.label: text
texts.orig:
Monitor end of day closing and practices when logging in money to be taken to the bank.
Submit weekly reports with specific timelines for each incident.
texts.text:
Monitor end of day closing and practices when logging in money to be taken to the bank.
Submit weekly reports with specific timelines for each incident.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: BEHAVIOR OF STAFF AND MY OBSERVATIONS
texts.text: BEHAVIOR OF STAFF AND MY OBSERVATIONS

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This first week I interacted with the manager and assistant manager, Jocie and Phil, who were in charge of training me. My interactions with the manager and assistant manager were unfortunately not long enough because I had to be training with Phil. This made it really difficult for me to follow them and then to write my notes when possible.
texts.text: This first week I interacted with the manager and assistant manager, Jocie and Phil, who were in charge of training me. My interactions with the manager and assistant manager were unfortunately not long enough because I had to be training with Phil. This made it really difficult for me to follow them and then to write my notes when possible.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Below I list my key notes from my observations this week.
texts.text: Below I list my key notes from my observations this week.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Key notes:
texts.text: Key notes:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Manager did not take cash from the registers every day I was there.
texts.text: Manager did not take cash from the registers every day I was there.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The managers spend time together with Jocie and even close the door sometimes.
texts.text: The managers spend time together with Jocie and even close the door sometimes.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Money was taken to the bank once, even though it was collected multiple times.
texts.text: Money was taken to the bank once, even though it was collected multiple times.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Money was taken at 1200 2 times and 1 time at 122pm.
texts.text: Money was taken at 1200 2 times and 1 time at 122pm.

texts.label: text

texts.text: An unknown man appears to know Rebeka, Viktoria, and Jocie.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The unknown man was talking mainly with Jocie.
texts.text: The unknown man was talking mainly with Jocie.

texts.text: The unknown man, from what Phil said, started to come around 5 weeks ago.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Phil is neutral but expressed his dislike of Viktoria.
texts.text: Phil is neutral but expressed his dislike of Viktoria.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Managing staff leaves for the day at inconsistent times.
texts.text: Managing staff leaves for the day at inconsistent times.

texts.text: Managers do not engage with staff often.

texts.orig: MY NOTES:
texts.text: MY NOTES:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Please check the timelines in this template. This template is helpful with analyzing the staff behavior and patterns. Considering this is the beginning of the investigation, I can see that the managers feel comfortable with me and even have invited me to go out with them out of work. Week 2 begins July 5.
